title: Gwen's Christmas Ghost
description: The plain sister of society's most sought-after lord, Gwen is used to being ignored, until she is rescued by the dashing, enigmatic, and ghostly Valerian Caine, a Georgian rake killed in a duel who has been granted a second chance if he can right the sins of his past. Original.Title was changed in later editions to "Gwen's Ghost".
author: Lynn Kerstan
